Title:

OLD CHARLIE by Clyde Robert Bulla, pictures by Paul Galdone


Description:

Two young brothers save an old horse from being sent to the factory to be made into cat food.

From Back Cover:

Bruce Todd and his brother have to get $25 by Wednesday. If they donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t bring the money by Wednesday, Mr. Hammer will sell Old Charlie to the cat-food factory.

Ã¢â‚¬Å“They can make that no-good horse into food for dogs and cats!Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ said Mr. Hammer.

Twenty-five dollars is a lot of money. Six days is not much time. Can the boys save Old Charlie?
